trans-unit.source: Defines the string value to use as a ToolTip for a property of a Web Parts control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control provides a generic user interface (UI) that enables users to edit custom properties on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
The editing UI is provided for properties that are marked in the source code with the `WebBrowsable` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebBrowsableAttribute> class).

When a property is marked with this attribute, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control creates the editing UI based on the type of the property, and uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> object if needed to convert the value in each editing control to the type of the property.

The `WebDescription` attribute (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute> class) allows you to specify the ToolTip that appears with each control in the editing UI when the mouse pointer is positioned over the control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property to an empty string ("").
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified description.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property to `description`.
The `description` parameter is the value that will appear as a ToolTip for a property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
The ToolTip to use in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref>.

Represents an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.Description"></xref> property set to an empty string ("").

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.Default> field returns the same result as calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor> constructor.
Gets the ToolTip for a property to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref> control.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the value to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref>.
Gets or sets the ToolTip to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.DescriptionValue%2A> property gets or sets the same value that is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.DescriptionValue%2A> property is protected and therefore only accessible either within the class or through a derived class.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the value to display in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with this instance, or `null`.
`true` if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for the display name value.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Determines whether the current instance is set to the default value.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute"></xref> equals <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebDescriptionAttribute.Default"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
